Package sage.ai.behaviortrees

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BehaviorTree
    BehaviorTree is a class that allows for the easy construction of a Beahvior Tree which is a technique used for creating Artificial Intelligence in video games.
    BTAction
    BTAction represents an action behavior node in a behavior tree.
    BTBehavior
    BTBehavior is an abstract base class that represents a node in a behavior tree.
    BTComposite
    A BTComposite node is an inner node that maintains a collection of BTBehavior child nodes.
    BTCondition
    A BTCondition node is a leaf node that performs a boolean check on read-only data gathered from the game world.
    BTDecorator
    BTDecorator is an abstract behavior node that contains a single BTBehavior child.
    BTRepeat
    BTRepeat is a BTDecorator node that processes its child nodes a specific number of times before returning a return status.
    BTSelector
    A BTSelector node is a BTComposite that executes its child nodes from left to right looking for first success.
    BTSequence
    A BTSequence node is a BTComposite that executes its child nodes from left to right.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BTCompositeType
    BTCompositeType is an enumeration that contains the different types of composite nodes that exist.
    BTNodeType
    BTNodeType is an enumeration that contains the different types of behavior nodes that exist.
    BTStatus
    BTStatus is an enumeration that contains the different values of and valid states for a behavior's return status.
